text:
70 LaSalle Street, Apt. 13F
New York 27, N. Y.
August 12, 1963
Mr* James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
Washington 36, D.C. 20036
Dear Mr. Fellows:
Thank you for your letter of August 9 concerning
the Radio English Teaching series for which Mr. Dean
Gregory has been preparing scripts.
When the scripts have been typed, we would be glad
to have them sent to us at our home address, noted above.
As our work at Teachers College will begin again on
September 20, I hope the scripts will be ready for us to
see by the end of August.
Sincerely yours
Mrs. Robert L. Allen
